column7: Import: Value defined during implementation.  Example: "Host"

"create"
"update"
If record is not available then it will create or if record is present then it will update.
Sequencing Method for the Bridge Process.  Optional
Unique identification number used to identify the import message
Unique Company ID defined during implementation.  For example: "10001"

Message time zone for non region specific fields; If not specified, defaults to DB Time Zone. All region specific fields are assumed to be entered in the region’s time zone. Accepts Java Timezone ID
Ex.) America/Los_Angeles, America/New_York, US/Mountain, US/Central, Canada/Eastern
Unique tracking ID from sender’s side that is unique across all transmissions.
If this message is in response to a previous message, tracking ID of original message.
The destination system(s) to route the XML. Accepts comma separated values of valid destinations setup in IFEE/IFSE.
